children.name: click
children.description: Fires when the user taps the button.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **BackButton** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the BackButton element from DOM.

children.name: Initialize Kendo mobile BackButton using jQuery plugin syntax
Initialize Kendo mobile BackButton based on role data attribute
